function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changes in agricultural practices leading to increased larval densities of disease-carrying mosquitoes","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission and higher disease prevalence","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce stagnant water pools and optimize irrigation practices","Technologies":"Improved irrigation and drainage systems","People":"Local communities in areas with rice paddies and agricultural irrigation","Owner":"Local agricultural authorities and community leaders"},{"Description":"Water shortages leading to increased contact with snail-infested waters and more breeding sites for disease-carrying mosquitoes","Impact":"Higher risk of schistosomiasis and increased mosquito-borne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promoting water conservation and providing alternative water storage solutions","Technologies":"Water recycling systems and community water management programs","People":"Communities facing water shortages and warmer climates","Owner":"Local government and community organizations"},{"Description":"Unplanned urbanization leading to proliferation of slums and inadequate sanitation, leading to increased vector-borne disease transmission","Impact":"Higher prevalence of vector-borne diseases in urban areas","Mitigation":"Investing in urban infrastructure and sanitation systems, promoting planned urban development","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, sanitation technologies, waste management systems","People":"Residents of urban slums and rapidly growing cities","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased house infestations of triatomine bugs due to simple improvements in public streetlights","Impact":"Higher risk of Chagas disease transmission and prevalence","Mitigation":"Implementing insect control measures and community awareness programs","Technologies":"Insecticide treatment, community education campaigns","People":"Residents in areas with improved street lighting","Owner":"Local government and health authorities"}]}
